snippet: Some 40 exhibitions of the artist’s work — much of it previously unseen by the public — will be flooding university art museums and institutions this year.
abstract: Donation of over 14,000 works to various institutions by Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts has prompted plans for about 40 Warhol exhibitions across United States; is third and final round in program of donations that has resulted in distribution of 52,786 works to 322 institutions since 1999.
lead_paragraph: Some 40 exhibitions of the artist’s work — much of it previously unseen by the public — will be flooding university art museums and institutions this year.

keywords.value: Warhol, Andy, Foundation for the Visual Arts
keywords.name: organizations
